metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4367 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to116.0.5845.96 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to bypass an enterprise policy via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
